desc: Shop Chaulri for classic, elegant and stylish pearl jewelry designs at up to 85% percent below retail prices. Our top-quality South Sea Tahitian black pearls, freshwater and akoya pearls are directly imported from farms and hand-picked by GIA-certified specialists for its excellent luster, color, surface and shape.

layout.text: Shop Chaulri for classic, elegant and stylish pearl jewelry designs at great prices.
